Verses: 1 pinbu, Vaanaththile Peridhum Aachchariyamumaana Veroru Adaiyaalamaagiya Kadaisiyaana Ezhu Vaadhaigalaiyudaiya Ezhu Thoodharaik Kanden, Avaigalaal Dhevanudaiya Kobam Mudigiradhu.

2 andriyum, Akkini Kalandha Kannaadik Kadalpondra Oru Kadalaiyum, Mirugaththirkum Adhin Soroobaththirkum Adhin Muththiraikkum Adhin Naamaththin Ilakkaththirkum Ullaakaamal Jeyangondavargal Dheva Suramandalangalaip Pidiththukkondu Andhak Kannaadik Kadalaruge Nirkiradhaiyum Kanden.

3 avargal Dhevanudaiya Oozhiyakkaaranaagiya Moseyin Paattaiyum Aattukkuttiyaanavarudaiya Paattaiyum Paadi: Sarvavallamaiyulla Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Dhevareerudaiya Kiriyaigal Magaththuvamum Aachchariyamumaanavaigal; Parisuththavaangalin Raajaave, Dhevareerudaiya Vazhigal Needhiyum Saththiyamumaanavaigal.

4 karththaave, Yaar Umakkup Payappadaamalum, Umadhu Naamaththai Magimaippaduththaamalum Irukkalaam? Dhevareer Oruvare Parisuththar, Ellaa Jaadhigalum Vandhu Umakku Munbaagath Thozhudhukolvaargal; Ummudaiya Needhiyaana Seyalgal Veliyarangamaayina Endraargal.
5 ivaigalukkuppinbu, Naan Paarththapodhu, Idho, Paralogaththile Saatchiyin Koodaaramaagiya Aalayam Thirakkappattadhu;
6 andha Aalayaththilirundhu Ezhu Vaadhaigalaiyudaiya Avvezhu Thoodhargalum Suththamum Piragaasamumaana Melliya Vasthirandhariththu, Maarbaruge Porkachchaigalaik Kattikkondu Purappattaargal.
7 appozhudhu Andha Naanku Jeevangalil Ondru, Sadhaakaalangalilum Uyirodirukkira Dhevanudaiya Kobaakkinaiyaal Niraindha Porkalasangal Ezhaiyum Andha Ezhu Thoodhargalukkung Koduththadhu.

8 appozhudhu, Dhevanudaiya Magimaiyinaalum Avarudaiya Vallamaiyinaalum Undaana Pugaiyinaale Dhevaalayam Niraindhadhu; Ezhu Thoodhargaludaiya Ezhu Vaadhaigalum Mudiyumvaraikkum Oruvarum Dhevaalayaththirkul Piravesikkakkoodaadhirundhadhu
